title: ‘Doing duty to appease her master': Cong's KC Venugopal counters Smriti Irani's jibe at Gandhis over women's quota bill
selftext: Venugopal told news agency ANI,"BJP and Prime Minister have given a portfolio for her to abuse Congress party and Gandhis. She is doing that duty to appease her master".
